author: Annette Spaulding
content:
This IS TRULY A MIRACULOUS event and I just love how every one worked together that day to successfully save everyone.
This is s fabulous , well written article.
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR WRITING THIS.
EVERYONE SHOULD READ THIS AND if we all worked together, republicans and democrats , black or white , rich or poor , JUST THINK HOW WONDERFUL THAT WOULD BE !!

author: Doug Bostrom
content: Also even while it was not in the checklist, they started the APU without which the aircraft would have reverted to “alternate law” likely making the touchdown much worse.
